statements: UPDATE biometric_data SET heart_rate = 80, body_temperature = 98.6, session_duration = '1 hour' WHERE patient_id = 1;

UPDATE biometric_data SET session_duration = '01:30:00', heart_rate = 80, body_temperature = 99.20 WHERE session_id = 10 AND patient_id = 201;
